document_api_meta.title: Get Eligible Shipping Service
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API ( for US ) to query the list of available shipping services when specifying packages' size or weight. The shipping fee and delivery time is an estimate only and is based on the package dimensions and weight you provided. Options listed may differ if you change the package attributes at the time of shipping.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: weight
request_body_param.desc: The weight of the scheduled package.

request_body_param.name: ^value
request_body_param.desc: The weight of the scheduled package.

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc:
The unit of measurement is used to measure the weight.
- GRAM
- POUND

request_body_param.name: dimension
request_body_param.desc: The dimensions of the scheduled package.

request_body_param.name: ^length
request_body_param.desc: The length of the package. The length, width, height must be passed together.

request_body_param.name: ^width
request_body_param.desc: The width of the package. The length, width, height must be passed together.

request_body_param.name: ^height
request_body_param.desc: The height of the package. The length, width, height must be passed together.

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc:
The unit of measurement is used to measure the length.
- CM
- INCH

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^order_id
response_param.desc: TikTok Shop order ID

response_param.name: ^order_line_id
response_param.desc: Line item ID list

response_param.name: ^weight
response_param.desc: The weight of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^value
response_param.desc: The weight of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc:
The unit of measurement is used to measure the weight.
- GRAM
- POUND

response_param.name: ^shipping_services
response_param.desc: Shipping services info.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: Shipping service ID

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: Shipping service Name

response_param.name: ^^price
response_param.desc: Estimated price for this service.

response_param.name: ^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency of the price

response_param.name: ^^earliest_delivery_days
response_param.desc: The minimum estimated duration required for parcel delivery.

response_param.name: ^^latest_delivery_days
response_param.desc: The maximum estimated duration required for parcel delivery.

response_param.name: ^^is_default
response_param.desc: Whether it is the default shipping service

response_param.name: ^^shipping_provider_name
response_param.desc: The name of shipping provider

response_param.name: ^^shipping_provider_id
response_param.desc: The ID of shipping provider

response_param.name: ^dimension
response_param.desc: The dimension of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^length
response_param.desc: The length of the package. The length, width, height must be passed together.

response_param.name: ^^width
response_param.desc: The width of the package. The length, width, height must be passed together.

response_param.name: ^^height
response_param.desc: The height of the package. The length, width, height must be passed together.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc:
The unit of measurement is used to measure the length.
- CM
- INCH

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
Invalid parameters. Please ensure you are passing the correct request parameter(s).
order does not belong to fulfill unit

There are no available shipping services for this request. Please modify the package weight, or double check the recipient address. If after multiple retries you continue to experience this error, please contact the platform for assistance.
There are multiple packages that can be shipped, please specify the order line that needs to be shipped.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServicePost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.FulfillmentV202309API.Fulfillment202309OrdersOrderIdShippingServicesQueryPost(context.Background(), "32132124331234")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBody := fulfillment_v202309.NewFulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBody()
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList := []string{"32132124331234"}
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBody.SetOrderLineItemIds(fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList)
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyWeight := fulfillment_v202309.NewFulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyWeight()
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyWeight.SetValue("0.4")
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyWeight.SetUnit("GRAM")
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBody.SetWeight(*fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyWeight)
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyDimension := fulfillment_v202309.NewFulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyDimension()
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyDimension.SetLength("0.3")
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyDimension.SetWidth("0.2")
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyDimension.SetHeight("CM")
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyDimension.SetUnit("INCH")
    fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBody.SetDimension(*fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBodyDimension)
    request = request.Fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBody(*fulfillment202309GetEligibleShippingServiceRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on seller's behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of seller's orders.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on your behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of your orders.
